name: LeapHogarth
commands: Lord Chief Justice Stronghart ~ Time-Keeper of the Law
Hm? I wasn't aware my appointment was pushed forward?
Precisely, what business do you have with me?
Lucky you, to have Marquess Zio. Paragon of bravery.|Leap... What a strange name...|And you, glasses?
Prof. Please, we're asking you to change your mind about Aurelia.
A Professor? Hm?|With all due respect, while your knowledge must be great...|I like having my good karma with the Goddess, it is more important than any information.
Well, Monsdor, their ally, is attacking our villages.|How's that for information?
I see... That sounds rather belligerent.|However, I do like my good graces with Aurelia.
Perhaps you could at least make Aurelia denounce Monsdor...
Well, though Monsdor is brutal, I see no purity for Arcei.
They attacked one of my villages! With monsters no less!|Sacrilege, I tell you.
But we don't think it was-
You say there was a monster attack, right?
We dealt with that attack en rout to your manor.
Oh? Well, I am very thankful... But I really must stay true to-
But, how would you know of the attacks?|I saw no messengers coming towards your manor on the way here.
Now that I think about it...|You're right, Prof.
Now, where were we? Ah yes.|What exactly are you trying to accuse me of, Professor?
Remember, I am the most powerful man in the Grahment Alliance.|Tread carefully
You'd let the other regions of your country die out...?
With all due respect, which is dwindling over time, yes.|My region comes first.|I would do anything for Ilkrest territory.
Including setting monsters on your own settlements?
Accusations, accusations.|As an intelligent man, I thought you'd know the importance of evidence.|Of which, you have none.
Now, I appreciate your defense of my land.|I hope you will accept a token of my gratitude.|However, I am afraid I don't know if I can help you.
I think I didn't hear a certain persons gratitude?
Marvellous! Now, go into my library.|Take your reward from the chest, I thank you.
